name: Feng Guo
story: Chang Tang grew up in a small village in China where he learned the art of marksmanship from his father. He joined the military at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional shooting skills. He is married to his childhood sweetheart and they have one child together. While he is a man of few words, those who know him say that he is fiercely loyal to his comrades and will stop at nothing to complete his mission.
